\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\& {A_1} \& {A_2} \& {A_3} \& {\,} \\
	{\,} \& {B_1} \& {B_2} \& {B_3} \& {\,} \& {\,} \\
	\& {C_1} \& {C_2} \& {C_3} \& {\,} \\
	\& {\,} \& {\,} \& {\,}
	\arrow["{f_A}", from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{m_1}", dashed, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{g_A}", from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{m_2}", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\delta _{r1}}", from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{m_3}", from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{f_B}", from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{n_1}", dashed, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{g_A}", from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{n_2}", from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\delta _{r2}}", from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{n_3}", from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{f_C}", dashed, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\delta _{c1}}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{g_C}", dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\delta _{c2}}", from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\delta _{r3}}", dashed, from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\delta _{c3}}", from=3-4, to=4-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
